text_blocks.content: ARREST/NOTICE TO APPEAR Juvenile Referral Report

additional_notes: The document is a Juvenile Referral Report from the Palm Beach Police Department. It contains details about a juvenile arrest, including the name of the juvenile, charges, and other relevant information. The document has both printed and handwritten sections.
